text:
to turn off safe mode
on your Android device.
Note that these steps may vary slightly

The first method is to
simply restart your device.
Just press and hold the power button
until you see the screen for shutting down

Tap on the restart button,
and it will shut down,
then start back up again in normal mode.

The next method may not be
available on all Android devices
but can be performed on most.

Simply swipe down from
the top of the screen.
This will open a menu that will have a tab

that reads something
like, "Safe Mode is On."

Tap on that tab, and it
will give you the option
to restart your device in normal mode.
